Performer:
Takemoto Sumitayū VII (see also Takemoto Mojitayū IX) (竹本住大夫 (七))

Alternate Name: Takemoto Mojitayū IX (竹本文字大夫 (九))

Dates: '1985/04-'

Specialty: Tayu

Notes: [Living National Treasure]; Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


Performances as Narrator:
